scripts.build:client:server: cd client && ng build --prod && cd .. && shx mv client/dist server/public
scripts.build:client:electron: cd client && ng build --bh ./ --prod && cd .. && shx mv client/dist electron/dist
scripts.build:client: npm run build:client:server && npm run build:client:electron
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf client/dist && shx rm -rf electron/dist && shx rm -rf server/public
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && bower install && cd ../electron && npm install
